name: Ultimate Surfing Buddy!
title: Ultimate Surfing Buddy!
desc: "Just find yourself a good swell, pick up a suitable surfboard, and you too can experience the joys of surfing whenever you want!"

skills.desc: Can only be played when there are at least a total of 2 Summons on the field (Both sides' Summons count): Randomly triggers an End Phase effect of one of your and the opponent's Summons.
